name: THE ANGRY TRIANGLE - made in 48 hours
name_original: THE ANGRY TRIANGLE - made in 48 hours
description:
Eng: You are a triangle that is angry because some red squares come towards you and you don't like that, so you shoot them.

----------------------------------------------

Ro: Tu esti un triunghi care este furios pentru ca niste patrate rosii vin spre tine si tie nu-ti place asta, asa ca le impusti.
